rooms.name: GrandEntrance1
rooms.description: You are in the Grand Entrance. You can barely see anything but dim shines of light.

rooms.name: Annubis' kitchen
rooms.description: You are in Annubis' Kitchen. You see a fire place with a unflamed torch on it

rooms.name: Annubis' Dinning Room
rooms.description: You are in a Annubis' Dinning Room. There is a box of matches here.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in the hallway.

rooms.name: Annbuis' Chamber
rooms.description: You are in Annubis' Chamber and you see Annubis. He sees you can starts walking towards you, and you hear keys in his pokcet. From your interest in Egytian ancient History, you know that Annubis is afraid of fire. Attack him to get to the keys to next room.

rooms.name: Stairs1
rooms.description: You are in a Room with stairs to the next floor. Go up but be warry, the challenge will only become harder....

rooms.name: GrandEntrance2
rooms.description: Congradulations! You have made it to level 2, but be warry! It will only become harder. You are now in a the grand entrance to level 2, but from burning Annubis, you torch ran out of fire and you cant see anything.

rooms.name: LivingRoom2
rooms.description: You are in Osiris' living room, and you see a small light from the windows. You see a patterned rug that seems like there's something under it.

rooms.name: Osiris' Dinning Room
rooms.description: You are in Osiris' Dinning Room, and you notice an open chest inside with a scratch on it.

rooms.name: Osiris' Chamber
rooms.description: You are in ' Osiris' Chamber, and you notice a table with matches on top.

rooms.name: Stairs2
rooms.description: You are in the room with the stairs to level 3, but blocking you is Osiris. You know that Osiris is really powerful, there's no way you can beat him barehands

rooms.name: GrandEntrance3
rooms.description: Congradulations! You've defeated Osiris! You can on floor three and you see a picture of Isis in the grand entrance. You noticed a locked Chest in the corner of the room.

rooms.name: Isis' Chamber
rooms.description: You see different tombs of Isis' late spouses and in one of them you see a key

rooms.name: Isis' Dinning Room
rooms.description: You're in Isis' Dinning Room, and you see a rug. Under the rug, you see a little bump

rooms.name: Stairs3
rooms.description: You see Isis blocking your way from the stairs. She screams to you I WANT MY JEWLERIES!!

rooms.name: GrandEntrance4
rooms.description: Congrats! You just surpasses Isis. You see paintings of Horus on the way and from your  egytian studies, you know that he's in his late years and he's super sick! Definitely don't get him near me!

rooms.name: Horus' Chamber
rooms.description: You're in Horus' Chamber, and you see him coming to you. He runs to you, but he starts coughing mid-way.

rooms.name: Stairs4
rooms.description: You've made it to the staircase to next floor, and you see a mystery chest. Luckily, it's already opened for you by soembody!

rooms.name: GrandEntrance5
rooms.description: Yay! You've made it to the fifth floor! You see a living roomm with different fruits on the table. On the table you also see a picture of Amun with his wife. Hmmm, from your past studies you knew that Amun loves his wife!

rooms.name: Stairs5
rooms.description: Omg! You see Amun, but he's crying though... You asked him what's wrong and he said 'I miss my wife'

rooms.name: GrandEntrance6
rooms.description: Congradulations! You've made it to the last level! You see Ra standing there wearing the headdress you were coming here for. He sees you and starts walking over, but you hear his stomach grumble.

rooms.name: Window
rooms.description: Congradulations! You've successfully escaped the pyramid and stole Ra's headdress.
